internet with your readers

ghostPost.plaintext:
Embed content from Giphy in Ghost to share the most awesome images on the
internet with your readers

Giphy has one of the largest libraries of the internet's most popular gifs, and
all of them can be freely embedded on any Ghost site. There are only a couple of
steps to get Giphy gifs working within your posts.

To get started, head over to Giphy and find the photo you'd like to use.

Select a gif and click embed
Open the share menu from the three dots and select Embed, then copy the code!

Within the Ghost editor, add a new HTML card
You can paste the form code within an HTML card on any page to embed your form

Enjoy your new Giphy integration

Have fun!
ghostPost.html:
Embed content from Giphy in Ghost to share the most awesome images on the internet with your readers

Giphy has one of the largest libraries of the internet's most popular gifs, and all of them can be freely embedded on any Ghost site. There are only a couple of steps to get Giphy gifs working within your posts.

To get started, head over to Giphy and find the photo you'd like to use.

Select a gif and click embed

Open the share menu from the three dots and select Embed, then copy the code!

Within the Ghost editor, add a new HTML card

You can paste the form code within an HTML card on any page to embed your form

Enjoy your new Giphy integration
